text: Daur railway station (, ) is located in Daur city, Shaheed Benazir Abad district of Sindh province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Shaheed Benazir Abad District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Daur railway station
